definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
sial rock (containing silicon and aluminium, so comparatively light, making continental plates)

sentences.english: This is some aluminum foil right?
Thermite effects changed to look like it is burning for several seconds before causing damage.
sentences.chinese: 鋁熱效應改變的樣子是前幾秒鐘燃燒造成的損害。

sentences.english: The new water-based mold coating for resin-bonded sand mold and core for aluminium castings has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 爲鋁鑄件樹脂砂型芯研製出新型的水基淺色塗料。

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 沒有苯甲酸酯，鋁，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐劑苛刻。

sentences.english: Aluminium foam special-shaped parts manufacture technology is a current important research field.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫鋁異型件製備技術是當前研究的重要領域。

sentences.english: The method of aluminum purification becomes the key to HPA development.
sentences.chinese: 鋁提純工藝爲高純鋁發展的關鍵。

sentences.english: The displacement of aluminum from its chloride by a more active metal worked adequately.
sentences.chinese: 用更積極的金屬從氯化物中提取鋁很有效。

sentences.english: This hole is under an inch from the aluminum base.
sentences.chinese: 這個洞是從下一個基地英寸的鋁。

sentences.english: The primary site of Al toxicity locates in root apices.
sentences.chinese: 鋁毒害的最初作用位點在根尖。

sentences.english: Also, there is no shortage of it in China, which tarnishes its allure.
sentences.chinese: 而且，中國也不缺少鋁，這使得鋁業務失去了吸引力。

sentences.english: Also, there is no shortage of it in China, which tarnishes its allure.
sentences.chinese: 而且，中國也不缺少鋁，這使得鋁業務失去了吸引力。

sentences.english: This machine is the specialized equipment for spreading hot butyl sealant uniformly onto the two sides of the aluminum spacing frame.
sentences.chinese: 該機是在鋁間隔框兩側均勻塗丁基熱熔膠的專用設備。

sentences.english: It pivots high in the aluminum frame to maximize rear wheel traction.
sentences.chinese: 它在鋁支點架高，以最大限度地提高後輪的牽引力。

sentences.english: Compared with other fuels, it may reduce the loss of metal aluminum by over 50%.
sentences.chinese: 與其他燃料相比，可減少金屬鋁損耗50%以上。

sentences.english: The process of frost formation on horizontal aluminum surface in natural convection was experimentally studied.
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了自然對流時水平鋁表面上的結霜現象。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
